sameAnalysis.part_name: 这些连接副词均有"因此，所以"之意。
sameAnalysis.word_list: accordingly, consequently, hence, so, therefore, thus
means: accordingly ：书面用词，强调根据某种原因而得出的结果，其前可用冒号或分号，但不用逗号。
consequently ：正式用词，侧重符合逻辑的结果。
hence ：较正式用词，指接下来的东西是理所当然的必需的东西，但强调其重要性。
so ：用于比较随便的场合，口语中多用。
therefore ：通常指引出一个推断出的必然结论。
thus ：多用于书面语中，可与therefore换用。

sentence.Network_en: They had children and were consequently tied to the school holidays.
sentence.Network_cn: 他们有孩子，当然就受学校假期的束缚。

sentence.Network_en: This poses a threat to agriculture and the food chain, and consequently to human health.
sentence.Network_cn: 这会对农业和食物链造成威胁，由此而危及人的健康。

sentence.Network_en: She was a bright and eager student and, consequently, did well in school.
sentence.Network_cn: 她是个聪明好学的学生, 因此学习成绩很好.

PerfectNetExp.abs: 水利专业英语 - 豆丁网 ... border 边沿边界 consequently 从而因此 surveillance 监视.
是_百度百科 ... [consequently;therefore] 因此；所以 [consequently;therefore] 所以；因此 (1) 此，这[ this;that].
职称英语考试大纲答案 ... precisely 确切地，精确地； consequently 因而，所以； accordingly 相应地；.
consequentially 必然地consequently 从而conservancy 保护

list.abs: consanguinity 岩浆同源consequent divide 顺向分水岭consequent river 顺向河
工业装备的“后果分析”（Consequence Analysis ）是一种定量估计工业装备失效后果严重程度的方法，该文主要介绍这种后果分析方 …
四六级高... ... in consequence of 因为…的缘故，由于 of consequence 重要的；有势力的 take the consequences 自食其果，承担责 …
四六级高... ... in consequence of 因为…的缘故，由于 of consequence 重要的；有势力的 take the consequences 自食其果，承担责 …
consequent ridge 顺向山脊consequent valley 顺向谷consequent 继起的

example.ex: Grandfather Dingsdale had sustained a broken back while working in the mines. Consequently, he spent the rest of his life in a wheelchair...
example.tran: 丁斯戴尔爷爷在矿井里工作时被压断了脊骨，结果，下半辈子都与轮椅为伴了。

example.ex: Relations between the two companies had, consequently, never been close.
example.tran: 因此，两家公司之间的关系一直都不太亲密。

means.word_mean: 1. (sentence connectors) because of the reason given;

sentences.sentence: "continued to have severe headaches and accordingly returned to the doctor"
"he had good reason to be grateful for the opportunities which they had made available to him and which consequently led to the good position he now held"

auth_sentence.content: Consequently, it's a toughie for subsequent cellists.

auth_sentence.content: Consequently when it melts it will _lower_ sea level.
auth_sentence.res_content: Consequently when it melts it will _lower_ sea level.
auth_sentence.res_content_con: Consequently when it melts it will _lower_ sea level.

auth_sentence.content: Consequently, the housing market is finally picking up.
auth_sentence.res_content: Consequently, the housing market is finally picking up.
auth_sentence.res_content_con: Consequently, the housing market is finally picking up.

stems_affixes.type_exp: 1. 表形容词,表示"……的",通常在在名词后.; 2. 表副词,放在形容词后,"……地"

stems_affixes.word_buile: come来+ly……的→翩翩而来→美丽动人的

stems_affixes.value_cn: 昂贵的,价值高的,豪华的
stems_affixes.word_buile: cost代价+ly……的→adj.昂贵的,价值高的,豪华的
drizz毛毛雨+ly……的→adj.毛毛雨的[a drizzly day]
friend朋友+ly……的→adj.友好的,友谊的

stems_affixes.value_cn: 很可能的,合适的,可靠的
stems_affixes.word_buile: like像+ly……的→adj.很可能的,合适的,可靠的

stems_affixes.value_cn: 活泼的,活跃的;栩栩如生的,真实的
stems_affixes.word_buile: live活+ly……的→adj.活泼的,活跃的;栩栩如生的,真实的
man男人+ly……的→adj.男子气概的,果断的
niggard小气鬼+ly……的→adj.吝啬的,勉强的
otherworld超世+ly……的→adj.超脱尘世的,超俗的
spindle细长的人[或物]+ly……的→spindly细长的,纤弱的
time时间+ly……的→adj.及时的,适时的
week周+ly……的→adj.每星期的,一周的 adv.每周一次 n.周刊,周报
month月+ly……的→adj.每月的 adv.每月一次,按月 n.月刊
continuous连续的+ly……的→adv.不断地,连续地

stems_affixes.value_cn: 幸福地,愉快地,恰当地,幸亏
stems_affixes.word_buile: happy快乐的,幸福的+ly……的→happily幸福地
active积极的+ly……地→adv.活跃地,积极地
week周+ly……的→adj.每星期的,一周的 adv.每周一次 n.周刊,周报
month月+ly……的→adj.每月的 adv.每月一次,按月 n.月刊
according相符的+ly……地→adv.因此,从而
final最后的+ly……地→adv.最后,终于

stems_affixes.value_cn: 实际上,事实上,竟然,居然,如今
stems_affixes.word_buile: actual[adj.实际的, 真实的, 现行的, 目前的]+ly……地→adv.实际上,事实上,竟然,居然,如今
adequate足够的+ly……地→adv.充分地
consequent作为结果的+ly……地→adv.从而,因此
anxious担忧的+ly……地→adv.忧虑地,不安地
biological[adj.生物学的]+ly……地→adv.生物学上
certain肯定的+ly……地→adv.的确,[口语]当然,行
chief主要的+ly……地→adv.首要,主要地
commercial商业的+ly……地→adv.商业上,通商上

stems_affixes.value_cn: 普遍地,通常地,现在,当前
stems_affixes.word_buile: current当前的,流动的+ly……地→adv.普遍地,通常地,现在,当前
decided确定的+ly……地→adv.果断地,断然地
definite明确的+ly……地→adv.一定地,明确地
easy容易的+ly……地→easily容易地

excessive过分的+ly……地→adv.过分地,非常地
extreme极端的+ly……地→adv.极端地,极其,非常
aggressive侵略的+ly……地→adv. 侵略地,攻势地

fortunate幸运的+ly……地→adv.幸运地

incidental附带的+ly……地→adv.附带地,顺便提及

logical逻辑的,符合逻辑的+ly……地→adv.论理上,逻辑上

moderate中等的,适度的+ly……地→adv.适度地
natural自然的+ly……地→adv.自然地
necessary必要的+ly……地→necessarily必要地
polite有礼貌的+ly……地→adv.客气地,斯文地,优雅地
positive肯定的,积极的+ly……地→adv.断然地;肯定地
preferable更可取的+ly……地→preferably更适宜
present现在+ly……地→adv.目前,不久
probable可能的+ly……地→probably或许,大概
progressive前进的+ly……地→adv.日益增多地
prompt敏捷的+ly……地→adv.敏捷地,迅速地
relative相对的;相关的+ly……地→adv.相关地
repeated重复的+ly表副词→adv.重复地,再三地

unfortunate不幸的+ly……地→adv.不幸地

month月+ly……的→adj.每月的 adv.每月一次,按月 n.月刊

Sentence.sentence: And instead, I grew up believing that I was supposed to be totally independent and consequently became very reluctant to ask for help.
And instead, I grew up believing that I was supposed to be totally independent and consequently became very reluctant to ask for help.

sentences.en: She was a bright and eager student and, consequently, did well in school.
sentences.cn: 她是个聪明好学的学生, 因此学习成绩很好。

jushi.english: Much of our knowledge and consequently much of our appreciation of his work is based on one biography.
jushi.chinese: 我们对他作品的许多认识以及由此而作出的许多评价都是以一本传记为依据的。
